text: gense ni tsuite mo mata raise ni tsuite mo. Mata kare-ra wa minashigo ni kanshi, anata ni toudearou. Itte yaru ga i. `Kare-ra no tame ni, yuri ni torihakarau no wa yoi kotodearu. Moshi, kare-ra to shitashiku äº¤Ru toki wa, anata gata wa kyodaidearu.' Arra wa, zen'i no mono to akuji o nasu mono o shitte ora reru. Arra ga oboshimeshinaraba, anata gata o kitto konwaku sa se rareru. Makotoni arra wa, iryoku narabu mono naku eimei de ara reru
